Mission completed.script:
{if event.reward > 0:
    Payment of {Humanise(event.reward)} credits {Occasionally(2, 'from {P(event.faction)}')} {OneOf('received', 'confirmed')}.
|elif event.donation > 0:
    {OneOf("Donated {Occasionally(2, '{Humanise(event.donation)} credits')} to {Occasionally(2, 'a grateful')} {P(event.faction)}",
                 "{P(event.faction)} has {Occasionally(2, 'gratefully')} received your donation {Occasionally(2, 'of {Humanise(event.donation)} credits')}",
                 "{P(event.faction)} thanks you for your donation {Occasionally(2, 'of {Humanise(event.donation)} credits')}"
    )}.
|else:
    Mission completed.
}
{for commodityreward in event.commodityrewards:
  {commodityreward.amount} tonnes of {commodityreward.commodity} {OneOf("now on-board", "also received", "confirmed on-board")}.
}
Mission completed.name: Mission completed
Mission completed.description: Triggered when you complete a mission

Mission accepted.description: Triggered when you accept a mission

Exploration data sold.script:
Exploration data for {len(event.systems)} systems sold for {Humanise(event.reward)} credits

{if len(event.firsts) > 0:
    , with an additional bonus of {Humanise(event.bonus)} credits for
    {if len(event.firsts) = 1:
        one first discovery
    |else:
        {len(event.firsts)} first discoveries
    }
}
.

Exploration data sold.description: Triggered when you sell exploration data

{OneOf("Purchased {OneOf('system', 'exploration')} data for {P(event.system)}",

Ship swapped.script:
{if event.storedship:
    {OneOf("Storing", "Mothballing", "Parking")} {ShipName(event.storedshipid, event.storedship)} and
|elif event.soldship:
    Selling {ShipName(event.soldshipid, event.soldship)} and
}

{OneOf("swapping","moving","transferring")} to {ShipName(event.shipid, event.ship)}.

Hull damaged.script:
{if event.vehicle = vehicle:
    {if event.health < 40:
        Danger:
    |elif event.health < 60:
        Warning:
    |elif event.health < 80:
        Caution:
    }
    {OneOf("Hull", "Hull integrity", "Integrity", "Structural integrity")} {Occasionally(3, "is")} at {event.health}%.
}
Hull damaged.name: Hull damaged
Hull damaged.description: Triggered when your hull is damaged to a certain extent

Entered signal source.script:
{Pause(2000)}

{if event.threat < 2:
  Entered signal source.
|elif event.threat = 2:
    Caution: medium-threat signal source.
|elif event.threat = 3:
    Warning: high-threat signal source.
|else:
    Danger: very high-threat signal source.
}

Docking timed out.script: No response to our docking request.
Docking timed out.name: Docking timed out
Docking timed out.description: Triggered when your docking request times out

Docking denied.script:
{Pause(2000)}

We have been denied docking

{if event.reason = "ActiveFighter":
    because our fighter is deployed
|elif event.reason = "Distance":
    because we are too far from the station
|elif event.reason = "Hostile":
    because the station's controlling faction doesn't like us
|elif event.reason = "NoSpace":
    because there is no space available
|elif event.reason = "Offences":
    because we have recently committed an offence against them
|elif event.reason = "TooLarge":
    because there are no landing pads that can accomodate the size of our ship
}.

Honorific.script:
{if system.allegiance = "Empire":
    {if cmdr.empirerating.rank <= 4:
       commander
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 5:
        sir
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank <= 11:
        my lord
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 12:
        your grace
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 13:
        your royal highness
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 14:
        your majesty
    }
|elif system.allegiance = "Federation":
    {if cmdr.federationrating.rank = 0:
        commander
    |else:
        {cmdr.federationrating.name}
    }
|else:
    commander
}
Honorific.name: Honorific
Honorific.description: Function to provide a suitable honorific for your commander

Station report.name: Station report
Station report.description: Function to report on the details of the current station

System report.script:
{_ Fetch from context }
{set reportsystem to SystemDetails(state.eddi_context_system_system)}

{if !reportsystem.name || reportbody.name = "":
    I'm not sure which system you are asking about.
|else:
    {P(reportsystem.name)} is
    {if reportsystem.allegiance = "Federation":
        a Federation
    |elif reportsystem.allegiance = "Empire":
        an Empire
    |else:
        an independent
    }
    {if reportsystem.government:
        {reportsystem.government}
    |else:
      system
    }
    {OneOf("of", "with a population of", "home to", "supporting")} {Humanise(reportsystem.population)} {OneOf("people", "souls")}
    {if reportsystem.power:
        , {OneOf("aligned to", "allied with", "controlled by")} {P(reportsystem.power)}
    }.

    {if reportsystem.faction:
      {P(reportsystem.faction)} is the {OneOf("controlling", "local", "immediate")} {OneOf("power", "faction")}.
    }

    {if len(reportsystem.stations) = 0:
      There are no stations present
    |else:
        {if len(reportsystem.orbitalstations) = 0:
            {if len(reportsystem.planetarystations) = 1:
                There is {OneOf("a single", "a lone", "just one", "one")} planetary station
            |else:
                There are {len(reportsystem.planetarystations)} planetary stations
            }
        |elif len(reportsystem.orbitalstations) = 1:
            There is {OneOf("a single", "a lone", "just one", "one")} orbital station
            {if len(reportsystem.planetarystations) = 1:
                and {OneOf("a lone", "a single", "one")} planetary station
            |elif len(reportsystem.planetarystations) > 1:
                and {len(reportsystem.planetarystations)} planetary stations
            }
        |else:
            There are {len(reportsystem.orbitalstations)} orbital stations
            {if len(reportsystem.planetarystations) = 1:
                and {OneOf("a lone", "a single", "one")} planetary station
            |elif len(reportsystem.planetarystations) > 1:
                and {len(reportsystem.planetarystations)} planetary stations
            }
        }
    }
    in this system.
}
System report.name: System report
System report.description: Function to report on the details of the contextual star system

Limpet check.description: Check for the presence/absence of limpets and limpet controllers

Landing pad report.script:
{set landingpad to state.eddi_context_landing_pad_pad}
Landing pad {landingpad} is at
{if landingpad = 1:
    six o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 2:
    six o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 3:
    six o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 4:
    six o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 5:
    seven o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 6:
    seven o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 7:
    seven o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 8:
    seven o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 9:
    eight o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 10:
    eight o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 11:
    nine o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 12:
    nine o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 13:
    nine o'clock mid
|elif landingpad = 14:
    nine o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 15:
    nine o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 16:
    ten o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 17:
    ten o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 18:
    ten o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 19:
    ten o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 20:
    eleven o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 21:
    eleven o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 22:
    eleven o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 23:
    eleven o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 24:
    twelve o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 25:
    twelve o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 26:
    one o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 27:
    one o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 28:
    one o'clock mid
|elif landingpad = 29:
    one o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 30:
    one o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 31:
    two o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 32:
    two o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 33:
    two o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 34:
    two o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 35:
    three o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 36:
    three o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 37:
    three o'clock mid
|elif landingpad = 38:
    three o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 39:
    four o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 40:
    four o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 41:
    five o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 42:
    five o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 43:
    five o'clock mid
|elif landingpad = 44:
    five o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 45:
    five o'clock far
}
, as you enter with the green lights on your right.

Landing pad report.description: Report on the location of a landing pad

Body report.description: Function to report on the details of the contextual body

Star report.name: Star report
Star report.description: Function to report on the details of the contextual body

System distance report.name: System distance report
System distance report.description: Function to report on the distance to the contextual system

System state report.script:
{_ Fetch from context }
{set reportsystem to SystemDetails(state.eddi_context_system_system)}

{if !reportsystem.name || reportbody.name = "":
    I'm not sure which system you are asking about.
|else:
    {P(reportsystem.name)}
    {if reportsystem.state = "None":
      is not in any particular state at current
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Retreat":
        is in retreat
    |elif reportsystem.state = "War":
        is at war; caution is advised
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Boom":
        is undergoing a boom; there might be good trading profits to be made here
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Civil War":
        is experiencing civil unrest; caution is advised
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Civil War":
        is in civil war; caution is advised
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Famine":
        is in a state of famine; caution is advised
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Lockdown":
        is in lockdown; caution is advised
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Outbreak":
        is attempting to contain an outbreak of disease; caution is advised
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Expansion":
        is gearing up to expand to another system
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Bust":
        is financially bust
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Election":
        is electing new leaders
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Investment":
        is investing in its infrastructure
    |else:
    }
    .
}
System state report.name: System state report
System state report.description: Report on the current state of the contextual system
